original_text: And behold, a woman who had suffered from a discharge of blood for twelve years came up behind him and touched the fringe of his garment,
korean_text: 열두 해 동안이나 혈루증으로 앓는 여자가 예수의 뒤로 와서 그 겉옷 가를 만지니

sentences.original_text: a woman who had suffered from a discharge of blood for twelve years
sentences.korean_translation: 십이 년 동안 혈루증으로 앓던 한 여자가

sentences.original_text: and touched the fringe of his garment,
